creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: thick green grasses against gold background of clouds; various overlapping flowers in blue, red, white; blue and yellow flowers; white and yellow flowers, and tiger lilies; large moon (?) in center panel
medium: Polychrome on silver and gilded paper
provenance: Ogino Museum of Art, Kurashiki, Okayama
title: Musashino 武蔵野
